block.p: Recent Sale $17.25 million Showplace Center 145 East Service Road Travis, Staten Island A real estate investor bought this 51,494-square-foot vacant building, which formerly housed a UA theater. It is to be renovated by LA Fitness. Buyer: Acadia Realty Trust Buyer's broker: Christopher Conlon, Ripco Real Estate Seller: Ripco Real Estate Brokers: Paul Rich, Paul J. Massey Jr., Brian T. Leary and Matthew Giordano, Massey Knakal Realty Services

Recent Lease $50/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $442,500 441 Lexington Avenue (at 44th Street) Manhattan A financial communications consulting firm has leased the entire 8,850-square-foot fourth floor in this 19-story 1924 building. Tenant: Integrated Corporate Relations Tenant brokers: Robert Lowe and Kevin Daly, Cushman & Wakefield Landlord: 441 Lexington Avenue Company Landlord broker: Jared Silverman, Kaufman Organization

For Lease $113/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $250,000 317 West 13th Street (between Hudson Street and Eighth Avenue) Manhattan A vacant 2,220-square-foot ground floor retail space is available in this four-story town house in the meatpacking district. It may be combined with a 2,000-square-foot space with a terrace above it, bringing the approximate annual rent to $375,000. Owner: Michael J. Strauss Brokers: Christopher Owles and Kristin McCann, Sinvin Realty
